titles.title: We Bring The Sacrifice of Praise

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We bring the sacrifice of priase newline Into the house of the Lord. newline We bring the sacrifice of praise newline Into the house of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And we offer up to You newline The sacrifices of thanksgiving; newline And we offer up to You newline The sacrifices of joy.
